mapper.select: SELECT A.TechGroupNo AS TECH_GROUP_NO , A.TechGroupNm AS TECH_GROUP_NM , B.TechFieldNo AS TECH_FIELD_NO , B.TechFieldNm AS TECH_FIELD_NM , CONCAT('/tech/', B.TechFieldNo) AS URL FROM PATENT.TechGroup A INNER JOIN PATENT.TechField B ON A.TechGroupNo = B.TechGroupNo WHERE A.TechGroupNo < 7

SELECT A.TechFieldNm AS TECH_FIELD_NM , A.TechFieldNo AS TECH_FIELD_NO , B.TechItemNo AS TECH_ITEM_NO , B.TechItemNm AS TECH_ITEM_NM FROM PATENT.TechField A INNER JOIN PATENT.TechItem B ON A.TechFieldNo = B.TechFieldNo WHERE A.TechFieldNo = #{techFieldNo } ORDER BY TECH_ITEM_NO

SELECT A.TechFieldNo AS TECH_FIELD_NO , A.TechFieldNm AS TECH_FIELD_NM , A.TechFieldType AS TECH_FIELD_TYPE , B.TechItemNo AS TECH_ITEM_NO , B.TechItemNm AS TECH_ITEM_NM FROM PATENT.TechField A INNER JOIN PATENT.TechItem B ON A.TechFieldNo = B.TechFieldNo WHERE TechGroupNo = 7

SELECT A.TechGroupNo AS TECH_GROUP_NO , A.TechGroupNm AS TECH_GROUP_NM , B.TechFieldNo AS TECH_FIELD_NO , B.TechFieldNm AS TECH_FIELD_NM , C.TechItemNo AS TECH_ITEM_NO , C.TechItemNm AS TECH_ITEM_NM , D.MG_IPCNo AS MG_IPC_NO , D.MG_IPCCd AS MG_IPC_CD , E.AppNo AS APP_NO , E.AppDate AS APP_DATE , E.InvTitle AS INV_TITLE , E.InvNm AS INV_NM , E.RegNo AS REG_NO , E.RegDate AS REG_DATE , E.EstPrice AS EST_PRICE , E.ContactNum AS CONTACT_NUM FROM PATENT.TechGroup A INNER JOIN PATENT.TechField B ON A.TechGroupNo = B.TechGroupNo INNER JOIN PATENT.TechItem C ON B.TechFieldNo = C.TechFieldNo INNER JOIN PATENT.MG_IPC D ON C.TechItemNo = D.TechItemNo INNER JOIN PATENT.PatentList E ON E.IPC12 = D.MG_IPCCd WHERE A.TechGroupType ='MGSC' AND B.TechFieldNo = #{techFieldNo } -- PARAM 1 techFieldNo AND C.TechItemNo = #{techItemNo } -- PARAM 2 techItemNo ORDER BY D.MG_IPCNo , D.MG_IPCCd , E.AppNo LIMIT #{from }, #{size }

SELECT A.TechGroupNo AS TECH_GROUP_NO , A.TechGroupNm AS TECH_GROUP_NM , B.TechFieldNo AS TECH_FIELD_NO , B.TechFieldNm AS TECH_FIELD_NM , C.TechItemNo AS TECH_ITEM_NO , C.TechItemNm AS TECH_ITEM_NM , D.SC_IPCNo AS MG_IPC_NO , D.SC_IPCCd AS MG_IPC_CD , E.AppNo AS APP_NO , E.AppDate AS APP_DATE , E.InvTitle AS INV_TITLE , E.InvNm AS INV_NM , E.RegNo AS REG_NO , E.RegDate AS REG_DATE , E.EstPrice AS EST_PRICE , E.ContactNum AS CONTACT_NUM FROM PATENT.TechGroup A INNER JOIN PATENT.TechField B ON A.TechGroupNo = B.TechGroupNo INNER JOIN PATENT.TechItem C ON B.TechFieldNo = C.TechFieldNo INNER JOIN PATENT.SC_IPC D ON C.TechItemNo = D.TechItemNo INNER JOIN PATENT.PatentList E ON E.IPC1 = D.SC_IPCCd WHERE A.TechGroupType ='MGSC' AND B.TechFieldNo = #{techFieldNo } -- PARAM 1 techFieldNo AND C.TechItemNo = #{techItemNo } -- PARAM 2 techItemNo ORDER BY D.SC_IPCNo , D.SC_IPCCd LIMIT #{from }, #{size }

SELECT A.TechGroupNo AS TECH_GROUP_NO , A.TechGroupNm AS TECH_GROUP_NM , B.TechFieldNo AS TECH_FIELD_NO , B.TechFieldNm AS TECH_FIELD_NM , C.TechItemNo AS TECH_ITEM_NO , C.TechItemNm AS TECH_ITEM_NM , D.MG_IPCNo AS MG_IPC_NO , D.MG_IPCCd AS MG_IPC_CD , E.AppNo AS APP_NO , E.AppDate AS APP_DATE , E.InvTitle AS INV_TITLE , E.InvNm AS INV_NM , E.RegNo AS REG_NO , E.RegDate AS REG_DATE , E.EstPrice AS EST_PRICE , E.ContactNum AS CONTACT_NUM FROM PATENT.TechGroup A INNER JOIN PATENT.TechField B ON A.TechGroupNo = B.TechGroupNo INNER JOIN PATENT.TechItem C ON B.TechFieldNo = C.TechFieldNo INNER JOIN PATENT.MG_IPC D ON C.TechItemNo = D.TechItemNo INNER JOIN PATENT.PatentList E ON E.IPC1 = D.MG_IPCCd WHERE A.TechGroupType ='ETC0' AND B.TechFieldNo = #{techFieldNo } -- PARAM 1 techFieldNo AND C.TechItemNo = #{techItemNo } -- PARAM 2 techItemNo ORDER BY D.MG_IPCNo , D.MG_IPCCd , E.AppNo LIMIT #{from }, #{size }

SELECT A.TechGroupNo AS TECH_GROUP_NO , A.TechGroupNm AS TECH_GROUP_NM , B.TechFieldNo AS TECH_FIELD_NO , B.TechFieldNm AS TECH_FIELD_NM , C.TechItemNo AS TECH_ITEM_NO , C.TechItemNm AS TECH_ITEM_NM , D.SC_IPCNo AS MG_IPC_NO , D.SC_IPCCd AS MG_IPC_CD , E.AppNo AS APP_NO , E.AppDate AS APP_DATE , E.InvTitle AS INV_TITLE , E.InvNm AS INV_NM , E.RegNo AS REG_NO , E.RegDate AS REG_DATE , E.EstPrice AS EST_PRICE , E.ContactNum AS CONTACT_NUM FROM PATENT.TechGroup A INNER JOIN PATENT.TechField B ON A.TechGroupNo = B.TechGroupNo INNER JOIN PATENT.TechItem C ON B.TechFieldNo = C.TechFieldNo INNER JOIN PATENT.SC_IPC D ON C.TechItemNo = D.TechItemNo INNER JOIN PATENT.PatentList E ON LEFT(E.IPC1,3) = D.SC_IPCCd WHERE A.TechGroupType ='ETC0' AND B.TechFieldNo = #{techFieldNo } -- PARAM 1 techFieldNo AND C.TechItemNo = #{techItemNo } -- PARAM 2 techItemNo ORDER BY D.SC_IPCNo , D.SC_IPCCd LIMIT #{from }, #{size }

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM PATENT.TechGroup A INNER JOIN PATENT.TechField B ON A.TechGroupNo = B.TechGroupNo INNER JOIN PATENT.TechItem C ON B.TechFieldNo = C.TechFieldNo INNER JOIN PATENT.MG_IPC D ON C.TechItemNo = D.TechItemNo INNER JOIN PATENT.PatentList E ON E.IPC12 = D.MG_IPCCd WHERE A.TechGroupType ='MGSC' AND B.TechFieldNo = #{techFieldNo } -- PARAM 1 techFieldNo AND C.TechItemNo = #{techItemNo } -- PARAM 2 techItemNo ORDER BY D.MG_IPCNo , D.MG_IPCCd , E.AppNo

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM PATENT.TechGroup A INNER JOIN PATENT.TechField B ON A.TechGroupNo = B.TechGroupNo INNER JOIN PATENT.TechItem C ON B.TechFieldNo = C.TechFieldNo INNER JOIN PATENT.SC_IPC D ON C.TechItemNo = D.TechItemNo INNER JOIN PATENT.PatentList E ON E.IPC1 = D.SC_IPCCd WHERE A.TechGroupType ='MGSC' AND B.TechFieldNo = #{techFieldNo } -- PARAM 1 techFieldNo AND C.TechItemNo = #{techItemNo } -- PARAM 2 techItemNo ORDER BY D.SC_IPCNo , D.SC_IPCCd

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM PATENT.TechGroup A INNER JOIN PATENT.TechField B ON A.TechGroupNo = B.TechGroupNo INNER JOIN PATENT.TechItem C ON B.TechFieldNo = C.TechFieldNo INNER JOIN PATENT.MG_IPC D ON C.TechItemNo = D.TechItemNo INNER JOIN PATENT.PatentList E ON E.IPC1 = D.MG_IPCCd WHERE A.TechGroupType ='ETC0' AND B.TechFieldNo = #{techFieldNo } -- PARAM 1 techFieldNo AND C.TechItemNo = #{techItemNo } -- PARAM 2 techItemNo ORDER BY D.MG_IPCNo , D.MG_IPCCd , E.AppNo

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM PATENT.TechGroup A INNER JOIN PATENT.TechField B ON A.TechGroupNo = B.TechGroupNo INNER JOIN PATENT.TechItem C ON B.TechFieldNo = C.TechFieldNo INNER JOIN PATENT.SC_IPC D ON C.TechItemNo = D.TechItemNo INNER JOIN PATENT.PatentList E ON LEFT(E.IPC1,3) = D.SC_IPCCd WHERE A.TechGroupType ='ETC0' AND B.TechFieldNo = #{techFieldNo } -- PARAM 1 techFieldNo AND C.TechItemNo = #{techItemNo } -- PARAM 2 techItemNo ORDER BY D.SC_IPCNo , D.SC_IPCCd;

SELECT A.TechGroupNo AS TECH_GROUP_NO , A.TechGroupNm AS TECH_GROUP_NM , B.TechFieldNo AS TECH_FIELD_NO , B.TechFieldNm AS TECH_FIELD_NM , C.TechItemNo AS TECH_ITEM_NO , C.TechItemNm AS TECH_ITEM_NM , D.SC_IPCNo AS SC_IPC_NO , D.SC_IPCCd AS SC_IPC_CD FROM PATENT.TechGroup A INNER JOIN PATENT.TechField B ON A.TechGroupNo = B.TechGroupNo INNER JOIN PATENT.TechItem C ON B.TechFieldNo = C.TechFieldNo INNER JOIN PATENT.SC_IPC D ON C.TechItemNo = D.TechItemNo INNER JOIN (SELECT IPC1 FROM PATENT.PatentList WHERE AppNo = #{number } ) E ON D.SC_IPCCd = E.IPC1 WHERE 1=1 LIMIT 1
